job_details.Vacaturetitel: Big Data Engineer for AI Training
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
job_details.full_text:
Big Data Engineer for AI Training

Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on using AI models to generate and evaluate code, rather than building or engineering AI systems. It lacks the core technical tasks and technologies associated with ML or GenAI engineering roles.

job_tasks.task: Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
job_tasks.justification: This task involves directly interacting with and providing data to train AI models, which falls under the modeling process.

job_tasks.task: Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
job_tasks.justification: This task involves assessing the output of AI models and providing feedback for their improvement, which is a form of model evaluation and fine-tuning.

soft_skills.justification: Implies a foundation of technical skills that can be adapted to a new domain (AI training).
Highlights the application of existing programming skills to a new context, suggesting adaptability.
Indicates a need for strong foundational coding skills that can be applied to AI model training.

soft_skills.skill: freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible
soft_skills.justification: Suggests a need for self-management and initiative, common in freelance or independent work.
